channel.title: People can't connect to my server!
channel.description:
Ok, well im hosting a hamachi server atm, im using Torvapkz v2 source and Torvapkz v1 client, i changed the ip to what i needed, in src/server/server.txt and changed it to my hamachi ip, i made sure my brother was connected to the channel i was hosting, then when he tries to connect, it throws him an "error connecting to server" somehow i can fking connect. I'm sure im still on local host somewhere, need someone to desperately help!
I would Rep++ if i could, but as soon as i can i will do it forever who can help.

item.title: People can't connect to my server!
item.dc:creator: @iil_pk_ii iil pk ii
item.description:
@iil_pk_ii wrote:

did you portforwarded on the Port 43594 ?

Read full topic
item.source: People can't connect to my server!

Nevermind, i got it!

item.title: People can't connect to my server!
item.dc:creator: @ZunitFLoW ZunitFLoW
item.description:
@ZunitFLoW wrote:

Use no-ip & go into your client.java & search 0.0.0.0 or 127.0… No ip works way better. Im hosting 2 servers off of it.

Read full topic
item.source: People can't connect to my server!

item.title: People can't connect to my server!
item.dc:creator: @Demo1 Demo_
item.description:
@Demo1 wrote:

You need to change the IP in the Client files(Client.java), not the source files. This belongs in Client Help.

Read full topic
